editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is drunk worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students and travelers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.name: The Spring Edition
editions.flavor_description: Wings for your spring: The Red Bull Spring Edition Energy Drink with the taste of Cherry Sakura

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Apricot Edition with the taste of Fuji Apple and a warm touch of Ginger

editions.name: The Ice Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Ice Edition: The energy drink with the exceptional taste of Blueberry, Vanilla and icy fresh notes of eucalyptus

editions.name: The Lilac Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Lilac Edition: the energy drink with a fresh and zesty new taste, combining Pink Grapefruit and Woodruff, refined with subtle floral accents

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Apricot Edition offers the perfect mix of Apricot and Strawberry with a hint of Peach

editions.name: The Peach Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Peach Edition has the taste of White Peach, a hint of citrus zest and floral accents

editions.name: The Pink Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: The Sugarfree Energy Drink with the taste of Forest Fruits and a surprising spicy touch of verbena

editions.name: The Lime Green Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Lime Green Edition has the exotic taste of Curuba, finished with a hint of Elderflower

editions.name: The Sea Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Sea Blue Edition with the delicious taste of Juneberry artificially flavoured
editions.alt_text: Red Bull The Sea Blue Edition - Image

editions.name: The Green Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Green Edition with the exotic taste of Cactus Fruit

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Edition of Red Bull contains the same high-quality ingredients as Red Bull Energy Drink and has the refreshing taste of Watermelon
